title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\Scheduling
name: Scheduling
description:
All parameters related to queuing and scheduling of custom jobs.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.Scheduling

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.timeout
params.description: The maximum job running time. The default is 7 days.

params.name: data.restart_job_on_worker_restart
params.description: Restarts the entire CustomJob if a worker gets restarted. This feature can be used by distributed training jobs that are not resilient to workers leaving and joining a job.
